description: Returns information about the dataset that you specify. For more information about datasets, see Flywheel overview in the Amazon Comprehend Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: DatasetType
nested_items.description: The dataset type (training data or test data).

nested_items.name: DatasetS3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3 URI where the dataset is stored.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The dataset status. While the system creates the dataset, the status is CREATING. When the dataset is ready to use, the status changes to COMPLETED.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the status of the dataset.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDocuments
nested_items.description: The number of documents in the dataset.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: Time when the data from the dataset becomes available in the data lake.
